body.raw:
## Prisma course for beginners.

In the video below you will find a comprehensive tutorial on using Prisma.io.

* What is prisma?
* How to use it.
* Examples

He explains it wonderfully.
All credit goes to him.

[![Prisma Course For Beginners - Full Prisma Tutorial CRUD](https://markdown-videos-api.jorgenkh.no/url?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DJ8ObGtfy5n0)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J8ObGtfy5n0)

Here is a link to his [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@PedroTechnologies)
